Shanti Mantra.sanskrit:
ॐ द्यौः शान्तिरन्तरिक्षं शान्तिः।
पृथिवी शान्तिरापः शान्तिरोषधयः शान्तिः।
वनस्पतयः शान्तिर्विश्वे देवाḥ शान्तिर्ब्रह्म शान्तिः।
सर्वं शान्तिः शान्तिरेव शान्तिः।
सा मा शान्तिरेधि॥
ॐ शान्तिः शान्तिः शान्तिः॥
Shanti Mantra.transliteration:
Om Dyauḥ Śāntir Antarikṣaṁ Śāntiḥ,
Pṛthivī Śāntir Āpaḥ Śāntir Oṣadhayaḥ Śāntiḥ,
Vanaspatayaḥ Śāntir Viśve Devāḥ Śāntiḥ Brahma Śāntiḥ,
Sarvaṁ Śāntiḥ Śāntir Eva Śāntiḥ,
Sā Mā Śāntir Edhi.
Om Śāntiḥ Śāntiḥ Śāntiḥ.
Shanti Mantra.english: May peace prevail in the heavens, peace in the sky, peace on earth, peace in the waters, peace in the plants, peace in the trees, peace among the gods, peace in Brahman, peace in all things, peace in peace itself. May that peace come to me. Om, peace, peace, peace.

Asato Ma Sadgamaya.sanskrit:
असतो मा सद्गमय।
तमसो मा ज्योतिर्गमय।
मृत्योर्मा अमृतं गमय॥
ॐ शान्तिः शान्तिः शान्तिः॥
Asato Ma Sadgamaya.transliteration:
Asato Mā Sadgamaya,
Tamaso Mā Jyotirgamaya,
Mṛtyor Mā Amṛtaṁ Gamaya.
Om Śāntiḥ Śāntiḥ Śāntiḥ.
Asato Ma Sadgamaya.english: Lead me from the unreal to the real; lead me from darkness to light; lead me from death to immortality. Om, peace, peace, peace.

Lokah Samastah Sukhino Bhavantu.sanskrit:
लोकाः समस्ताः सुखिनो भवन्तु।
ॐ शान्तिः शान्तिः शान्तिः॥
Lokah Samastah Sukhino Bhavantu.transliteration:
Lokāḥ Samastāḥ Sukhino Bhavantu,
Om Śāntiḥ Śāntiḥ Śāntiḥ.
Lokah Samastah Sukhino Bhavantu.english: May all beings in all worlds be happy and free. Om, peace, peace, peace.
